name: D'MEO
description:
Your sanity runs dry. Monsters are everywhere. You don't even know where you are, or who you are.  Take the pill and be safe,  or don't and experience true danger. Make the choice.

Controls; W A S D - Movement
      Q E     - Turning / Changing Weapon
  Space   - Interact / Attack Find the mirrors shards and escape from this sick reality.

[BUG] Currently there is a bug preventing the player from reaching the final level. This will be fixed after the Jam voting ends.
